"Hamstring injuries have a very high risk of relapse, 30%."

"Apart from the muscle injury, the emotional issue also needs to be worked on."

replies.msg:
åˆ†æAG

Andre Gomes is the total opposite. Not as flashy on his own as Paulinho, but more a catalyst in the system that makes it work. He helps making many players look better, and the team as a whole. Watch Celta match for example. Slice any 5 minutes of that match and track Andre.

You will see Andre retreating to RB when the RB makes a forward run. Stays there till they switch positions again. Acting sometimes as 3rd CB, a need to keep Alba flying. Moving to RW to stretch defense. Running to box to add numbers. Working in buildup.

Same as for Paulinho It's common to judge Andre for what he isn't doing, not for what he does. Note that he can do flashy stuff if invested in such. Watch him playing for Valencia. He'll look more charming doing so, less influential. Even if it's Normal to demand More,and he can.

Valverde is no idiot. If Gomes was half as bad as labeled, half fit Iniesta would've started. Masche in midfield and Raki in Andre's spot. Denis. Dembele. You name them. But he picked Andre. For what he adds. And rightfully so.

Thread link: https://twitter.com/footballmood/status/953286988752408576

"I thought my team had an excellent personality and fought well in a difficult stadium with a thrilling atmosphere."

Coutinho: "It's definitely a special day for me to start my career with this shirt, it's a dream for me. The most important this was that we won this game. The crowd welcomed me well, I'm happy."

"I suffered a lot to get here. This has been a dream of mine since my childhood. Many legends have played here at the Camp Nou, I'm very happy to realize this dream"

"I was a bit nervous and anxious, but later I calmed down and adapted to the game. I am very happy to have played my first minutes with this club. I was moved by my reception."

"In the end, we won, which was the most important thing, and got through to the next round. It was a difficult game as we expected. They waited for us on the counter, but from the first moment we controlled the play, we had a good game, and we deserved the victory."
